description: This recipe for spiced persimmon&nbsp;bourbon will delight those who enjoy a little bite. The sweet and sour flavors of the fruit are offset by the warm spices, making this drink both satisfying and refreshing. It's perfect for celebrating the Christmas season with this!
name: Spiced Persimmon Bourbon
